[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [ASTNode](./blockly.astnode_class.md) &gt; [createStackNode](./blockly.astnode_class.createstacknode_1_method.md)

## ASTNode.createStackNode() method

Create an AST node of type stack. A stack, represented by its top block, is the set of all blocks connected to a top block, including the top block.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static createStackNode(topBlock: Block): ASTNode | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  topBlock | [Block](./blockly.block_class.md) | A top block has no parent and can be found in the list returned by workspace.getTopBlocks(). |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ASTNode](./blockly.astnode_class.md) \| null

An AST node of type stack that points to the top block on the stack.
